original_text: And the other lamb thou shalt offer at even, and shalt do thereto according to the meat offering of the morning, and according to the drink offering thereof, for a sweet savour, an offering made by fire unto the Lord.
korean_text: 한 어린 양은 저녁 때에 드리되 아침에 한 것처럼 소제와 전제를 그것과 함께 드려 향기로운 냄새가 되게 하여 여호와께 화제로 삼을지니

sentences.original_text: And the other lamb thou shalt offer at even
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 다른 어린 양은 네가 저녁에 드릴지니

sentences.original_text: and shalt do thereto according to the meat offering of the morning
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 아침 소제에 따라 그것을 행할지니

sentences.original_text: and according to the drink offering thereof
an offering made by fire unto the Lord
